Section.Catchline: Security interests arising under chapter 672 or chapter 680.

SectionBody.Text: A security interest arising under s. 672.401, s. 672.505, s. 672.711(3), or s. 680.508(5) is subject to this chapter. However, until the debtor obtains possession of the goods:

Subsection.Text: The security interest is enforceable, even if s. 679.2031(2)(c) has not been satisfied;
Filing is not required to perfect the security interest;
The rights of the secured party after default by the debtor are governed by chapter 672 or chapter 680; and
The security interest has priority over a conflicting security interest created by the debtor.
